mapper.insert: insert into product(shop_name, product_name, price, image, type) values(#{sessionScope.name}, #{product_name}, #{price}, #{image}, #{type})
mapper.select: select * from product order by shop_name=#{name}
mapper.update: update product set shop_name=#{sessionScope.name}, product_name=#{product_name}, price=#{price}, image=#{image}, type=#{type} where shop_name=#{sessionScope.name}
